title: Keep Pets Warm Indoors
description: Provide cozy bedding, blankets, and warm spots inside the house to help pets stay comfortable during cold days.

title: Protect Paws from Ice & Snow
description: Apply paw balm or use pet booties to prevent cracking, frostbite, or irritation from salt and ice.

title: Regular Grooming
description: Maintain a clean, untangled coat to retain natural warmth; avoid shaving short in winter.

title: Adjust Diet & Hydration
description: Ensure pets have enough calories and fresh water to maintain energy and hydration in cold weather.

title: Limit Cold Outdoor Exposure
description: Shorten walks in extremely cold weather and provide winter clothing like jackets or sweaters.

title: Check for Winter Health Issues
description: Monitor for signs of hypothermia, frostbite, or arthritis flare-ups and consult a vet when necessary.
